dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for natural language inference containing 1.6 million sentence pairs, focusing on entailment, contradiction, and neutral relationships.
dcterms:title: SNLI

dcterms:creator: Ellie Pavlick
Timothy McCoy
Tal Linzen
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to test syntactic heuristics in natural language inference, containing examples that challenge models' understanding of syntax and logical structure.
dcterms:title: McCoy et al. (2019) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Maximilian Glockner
Vivian Shwartz
Yonatan B. Goldberg
dcterms:description: A dataset created by modifying SNLI examples with single word replacements based on WordNet, testing lexical inferences and simple world knowledge.
dcterms:title: Glockner et al. (2018) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Aruni Naik
Anusha Ravichander
Natalie Sadeh
Chris Rose
Gizem Geyik
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of various tests motivated by a manual examination of 100 mistakes made by top-performing models, focusing on categories like antonyms, word overlap, negation, length mismatch, and spelling errors.
dcterms:title: Naik et al. (2018) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Shyam Upadhyay
Swarnadeep Chatterjee
Karthik Sankaran
Sameer Singh
dcterms:description: A dataset created by modifying SNLI examples with single word replacements based on WordNet, testing lexical inferences and simple world knowledge.
dcterms:title: Glockner et al. (2018) Dataset
